Package mailsystem

Class Email

java.lang.Object
mailsystem.Email
public class Email
extends java.lang.Object
The Email class implements mail creation and managing functionalities
Version:
v1
Author:
PMOO teachers

    • equalsReceiver

      public boolean equalsReceiver​(Email emailp)
      Checks if the receiver of the instanced object is equal to the one passed from parameter
      Parameters:
      emailp - mail whose receiver will be compared with the instanced object mail. actual (String)
      Returns:
      true = both mails have same receiver; false = different receiver.
